Posts.Content: DeDe6065 wrote: I will begin my SSDI this July. My boss asked if I would still be able to work part time 10-15 hrs a week in between chemo treatments. Does anyone work part time without messing up the SSDI? Would love to still be able to get out among the real world. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: SSDI work part time? DeDe6065 heatherpalmerton

Posts.Content: Jun 25, 2009 09:43AM DeDe6065 wrote: Dear lovinmomma,    I believe it has to be the chemo. I am going through the same thing. I am constantly messing up my words & thoughts. My DH has to try to guess what the heck I'm talking about because things come out jumbled or I can't remember what I was going to say. Eyesight downhill too in the 4 months since I started chemo. I thought brain mets but had brain MRI found nothing. Doc says most likely side effects since only 43. Sorry your going through this. I have been a waitress forever I don't think I would remember what table to bring the food too now. No tips for me!!!
Posts.Title: Is this normal or is my brain fried?? lovinmomma lovinmomma
